document_data.name: Saerol Danonbryl
document_data.home: [[Mulmaster]], [[Moonsea]]{{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|6}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Saerol Danonbryl''' was a member of the [[Zhentarim]] in [[Mulmaster]].
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Saerol was ordered by his master to kill the [[Lantan]]ese duelist [[Audrec SeTourne]], who was extorting a noble of the city who was allied with the Zhentarim, during one of the gladiator matches in the [[Black Blade and Bloody Boar]] tavern.{{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|8}}
